steps.instruction: Go to profile in the bottom of the screen.
scroll to bottom and check all the elements once
click on home icon in the bottom bar of the app
click on pharmacy tab just below search bar and check content are visible
go back to the previous screen
scroll and find cetaphill brand icon and click on it.
go to face and body face cream category
add first item to the cart
click on go to cart button in the bottom of the screen
any pop up comes cancel it.
increase the added item from one to two
